舌咽神経: (ぜついんしんけい) - glossopharyngeal nerve

舍人: (とねり) - servant/valet/footman; someone who works in close quarters with the emperor or imperial family; low-ranking official who works for the imperial family or nobility (under the Rituryo system); ox-tender for oxcarts/horse boy; honorary junior official of the Imperial Household Department's Board of Ceremonies involved in miscellaneous duties related to ceremonies
